thread.section_title: PrimeStyle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PrimeStyle | www.primestyle.com
thread.title: HELEN SUMMERBELL

author: HELEN SUMMERBELL
title: HELEN SUMMERBELL
text: i had my doubts buying expensive jewellery online and wanted to speak to someone to confirm the company existed. I also emailed and the response from the customer service representatives was so positive and reassuring that I felt very comfortable. When my earrings arrived, they were beautiful, just as the picture which attracted me in the first instance. A valuation certificate also accompanied them and the assurance that if anything was a problem to contact them. I just love wearing my earrings.
